3.Pros: Hours, decent pay, able to spend time with family, I liked my co-workers, I got some paid vacation too. Good breaks and benefits.

4.Summary: "Work is only made tolerable by good co-workers"

4.Cons: No benefits at all for anyone other than salaried managers, customers are ridiculous at times, work load is unbalanced

5.Pros: McDonald's is a great career. I was responsible for all aspects of the operation. Its a fast paced teamwork environment. I was very happy there.
5.Cons: The challenges of staffing were always something to stay 2 steps ahead of.Working and development of people was very fulfilling.

6.Pros: It was a great experience and first job I've had.

7.Pros: Great benefits and the knowledge that you receive in your development surpasses most other companies
